anime.description: Yamishibai is a picture-story style of animation whose motif is surrounded and based off the rumors, and urban legends throughout the history of Japan. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: horror
tag.description: The horror cinematic genre is characterized by the attempt to make the viewer experience dread, fear, terror, or horror. Often their plots involve the intrusion of an evil force, event or personage, sometimes of supernatural origin, on the mundane world and the consequences thereof.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: まねっこ
Copycat
Manekko
episode.summary: The story of two girls who have been together in all things since they were children. Yukari has always been the type who wanted to do everything her best friend Haru did. It`s unclear whether she acts out of envy, love, or madness, but her feelings become a darkness that leads to a tragic fate... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カラスの子
The Crow Children
Karasu no Ko
episode.summary: The story of a woman and her young daughter visiting family in the countryside. On the way there, they meet a somewhat eerie-looking old woman dressed all in black, and this meeting entangles the mother and daughter in something disturbing. What did the little girl see in a seemingly ordinary flock of crows? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ちょうだい
Give It to Me
Choudai
episode.summary: The story of a certain office lady. On her way home from work, she meets a young girl in the park who persistently asks her to give her things. The moment she begins to see her past self in this young girl, things take a frightening turn. Can she escape the darkness of material desire? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 間違い電話
Wrong Number
Machigai Denwa
episode.summary: The story of a family leading a rather affluent lifestyle. A young woman realized her dream and married an elite businessman. However, contrary to her ideal, her new husband works so much that he has no time for his family, and things aren`t going as smoothly as she`d imagined with her new stepchild. One day, as she`s beginning to feel he exhaustion of this new life wearing on her, she receives a phone call. It sounds like someone`s tried to call the nursery school and reached her by mistake... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妖婦
Seductress
Youfu
episode.summary: The story of a stunningly beautiful woman. A certain reporter lies in wait after learning of a strange incident in which young men have been disappearing. In the midst of his investigation, he encounters a certain woman, and watches as she seduces men one after another. The shocking last installment... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最終バス
The Last Bus
Saishuu Bus
episode.summary: The story of an office lady living a peaceful life. One day, on her bus ride home, she saw a strange woman wearing a kimono, but she decided to pretend she hadn`t seen her. Then terror struck... The bus continues to roll along, carrying her resentment on board... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひとりでいい
I`m the Only One
Hitori de Ii
episode.summary: The story of an office lady who was very proud of her beautiful hair. It`s so beautiful that she is the envy of all her friends, and their constant compliments intoxicate her. She gazes at herself in the mirror, never realizing that a tragic disaster awaits her. Is it jealousy or resentment that resides in her bewitching black hair? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 花占い
Flower Reading
Hana Uranai
episode.summary: The story of a company employee waiting at a bus stop. On a rainy night, a young girl with an ethereal feel about her begins the child`s game of flower reading with a bloom held in her small hand. Is she a dream, or an illusion? Her readings toy with his mind more and more. As he watches the petals fall, the man learns of his own fate... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幽霊を見るには
If You Want to See Ghosts
Yuurei o Miru ni wa
episode.summary: The story of a college student who loved to gossip. A rumor has been spreading among her friends that lures them to the depths of fear. When she peers into a friend`s eyes, she can see a white silhouette. At this moment, no one knows that this was only a glimpse into a terror that has yet to begin... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お隣さん
The Neighbors
Otonari-san
episode.summary: The story of a college student who`s just moved into a new apartment. As she`s enjoying life in her new home, she hears strange sounds coming from next door. She doesn`t yet know of the world of madness that visits from within loneliness... This night enveloped in stillness will never again return, and there`s nowhere to run... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 隠連母
Hide-and-Seek
Kakurenbo
episode.summary: The story of a family visiting the countryside. The grandma tells her grandson Takeshi that he must not go near the house with the mountain behind it. But Takeshi, during a game of hide-and-seek with his cousins, disobeys his grandma and enters the forbidden house. From there, Takeshi is led into a world of darkness... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オカエシサマ
Giveback-sama
Okaeshi-sama
episode.summary: The story of a high school girl who is heartbroken after her boyfriend left her for her best friend. She`s still in shock when she stumbles upon a book of incantations. One incantation in its pages sucks her into a whirlpool of terror. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女のカゲ
Shadows of Women
Onna no Kage
episode.summary: The story of a woman who wishes for happiness after getting married. However, her husband always comes home late from work, leaving her feeling doubtful. One night, she discovers several emails from a woman on her husband`s phone, and accuses him of cheating on her. But that was only the beginning of a dark world she would wish she had never known... Source: crunchyroll
